title: Group Project
description: Collaborative project requiring coordinated planning, production, and review.

milestones.name: Assemble a team
milestones.description: Confirm group membership, contact details, and initial expectations.

milestones.name: Bond with the crew
milestones.description: Establish working agreements, clarify individual strengths, and select communication tools.

milestones.name: Endure hardships together
milestones.description: Identify project risks, assign roles, and schedule regular checkpoints.

milestones.name: Face rising tension
milestones.description: Monitor progress against milestones and resolve blockers promptly.

milestones.name: One of your disciples betrays you
milestones.description: Reassess workload distribution and capture action items in shared documentation.

milestones.name: Crucifixion
milestones.description: Bring deliverables together, integrate contributions, and rehearse presentations if needed.

milestones.name: Oh wait nevermind you somehow made it back
milestones.description: Complete peer review, implement final feedback, and prepare submission package.

milestones.name: Dance sequence
milestones.description: Deliver the final submission and celebrate the team effort responsibly.
